name.baseName: 猪肉生产 ; 肉猪饲养

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: During the fattening period of live pigs, the feed of fattening pigs is all concentrate feed
在生猪育肥期内，育肥猪饲料全部为精饲料

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Pig feed ingredients (Liu Mingda et al., 2012)

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average water consumption per cow was 70kg per day, according to the investigation of Shigangdun pasture of Qianjin Animal Husbandry in Zhangye City
根据作者对张掖市前进牧业石岗墩牧场调查得到平均每头奶牛每天耗水 70kg

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: LCA was used to evaluate the four livestock products, and to evaluate the resource consumption, product input and environmental emissions in the whole process from raw material production to final product production. The four livestock products were evaluated in the same evaluation model, and the impact degree of a certain type of environmental impact and its comprehensive impact on the environment were qualitatively and quantitatively assessed. Finally, the environmental impact indicators of producing 1kg beef, 1kg milk, 1kg pork and 1kg chicken eggs were obtained respectively. Through analyzing and comparing the environmental load of the production of four kinds of livestock products, suggestions were provided for the adjustment of the breeding structure of China's livestock industry and the production structure of livestock products. And through the field research of advancing animal husbandry in Zhangye City, learning from the development model of advancing animal husbandry cooperative, the development model of grassland agriculture in China was discussed.

通过 LCA 评价这四种畜产品，从原材料生产到最终产品产 出全过程的各种资源消耗、产品投入、环境排放，在同一种评价模型中评价四种 畜产品，定性、定量地评估单位畜产品生产对某一环境影响类型的影响程度、以 及对环境综合影响，最终分别得到生产 1kg 牛肉、1kg 牛奶、1kg 猪肉、1kg 鸡 蛋对环境的影响指标，通过分析比较四种畜产品生产对环境的负荷，为我国畜牧 业养殖结构和畜产品生产结构调整提供建议。并且通过在张掖市前进牧业实地调 研，借鉴前进牧业合作社发展模式，探讨我国草地农业发展模式。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process relates specifically to pork production, with a focus on the fattening stage in pig raising where concentrate feed is used exclusively. This indicates the usage of the pigs primarily for meat production. These fattening pigs are likely part of a larger scale agricultural livestock farm or operation. The average final weight of these pigs at the time of sale, or 'offtake,' is 125kg. This set of data may be used to model the environmental impacts of pork production for comparison with other protein sources or to measure the efficiency and environmental footprint of a particular farming operation.
所述工艺特别涉及猪肉生产，重点关注使用全精饲料的猪只育肥阶段。这表明猪只主要用于肉类生产。这些育肥猪可能是较大规模农业畜牧农场或作业的一部分。出栏时这些猪的平均体重为125公斤。这组数据可用于模型化猪肉生产的环境影响，并与其他蛋白源进行比较，或用来衡量特定农业作业的效率和环境足迹。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 出栏时平均体重为 125kg（刘 鸣达等，2012），料肉比为 3：1（张颖等，2010）

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 魏云. 基于生命周期评价的禽畜产品环境影响评价及对策探讨. (兰州大学, 2016).
魏云. 基于生命周期评价的禽畜产品环境影响评价及对策探讨. (兰州大学, 2016).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this LCA data for pork production, users should ensure they incorporate the specific feed regime mentioned (exclusive use of concentrate feed) as this significantly affects the environmental footprint. Attention should also be given to the allocated water consumption of 70kg per cow per day, which could be a consideration for water resource impact assessments. The functional unit of 1kg pork should be used for comparison and scaling within system boundaries. The data reflecting average weight and feed-to-meat ratio provide critical parameters for calculating inputs and outputs within the life cycle of pork production.
在应用此生命周期评价（LCA）数据进行猪肉生产分析时，用户需确保他们纳入了提及的特定饲料制度（全精饲料的独家使用），因为这显著影响环境足迹。同样，用户也应关注分配的每头奶牛每天70公斤的水消耗，这可能是水资源影响评估的一个考虑因素。功能单位为1公斤猪肉，应用于系统边界内的比较和缩放。反映平均重量和饲料至肉比率的数据提供了计算猪肉生产生命周期内输入和输出所需的关键参数。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
